TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DocEvents_BeforeRightClickEventHandler(Range Target, out bool Cancel);
.class public auto ansi sealed DocEvents_BeforeRightClickEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DocEvents_BeforeRightClickEventHandler(Target As Range, ByRef Cancel As Boolean)
public delegate void DocEvents_BeforeRightClickEventHandler(Range ^ Target, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % Cancel);

Docs.param: Required. The cell nearest to the mouse pointer when the right-click occurs.
Optional. False when the event occurs. If the event procedure sets this argument to True, the default right-click action doesn't occur when the procedure is finished.
Docs.summary: A Delegate type used to add an event handler for the event. The BeforeRightClick event occurs when a worksheet is right-clicked, before the default right-click action.
